name: fix-incorrect-keybord-slovak
title: Fix Incorrect Keybord (Slovak)
description: Replacing numeric characters on the English keyboard with diacritical letters on the Slovak keyboard.
author: matus-markusek

commands.name: numbers-to-diacritics
commands.title: Numbers to Diacritics
commands.description: Replacing numeric characters on the English keyboard with diacritical letters on the Slovak keyboard.

commands.name: diacritics-to-numbers
commands.title: Diacritics to Numbers
commands.description: Replacing diacritical letters on the Slovak keyboard with numeric characters on the English keyboard.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
